list.title: Kingdom Overview
list.item-0: This is general overview of the given Kingdom
list.item-1: From here you have access to all related entities such as Heroes, Buildings and so on
list.item-2: Switch this page to an Edit mode to change Kingdom parameters
list.item-3: Because you are creating rules, be careful with all attributes set!

list.title: Something about Kingdoms
list.item-0: Kingdom is the root place, where everything happens.
list.item-1: You can create and define buildings withing a Kingdom.
list.item-3: To create a Kingdom other players will start with, use *template* for the Kingdom name

name.label: Kingdom name
name.required: Kingdom name is required, please choose some!

edit.label: Edit
edit.cancelConfirm: Do you want to cancel editation? All changes will be lost!

value.required: Please fill in value of the attribute!
